alert.note: Alert for Florence; Williamsburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 10 at 11:22PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Florence and central Williamsburg Counties through 1145 PM EDT... At 1121 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Mulberry to 8 miles east of South Sumter to near Salters. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts between 30 and 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lake City, Kingstree, Timmonsville, Salters, Sardis, Effingham, Cades, Cartersville, Nesmith, Indiantown, Gourdin, Hebron, New Hope, Henry, Scranton, Coward, Olanta, Lane, Greeleyville and Stuckey. This includes Interstate 95 in South Carolina between mile markers 147 and 154. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
